snippet: Simon Rattle, the chief conductor of the Berlin Philharmonic, will step down when his contract expires in 2018, the orchestra announced on Thursday.
abstract: Simon Rattle, the chief conductor of the Berlin Philharmonic, will step down when his contract expires in 2018, the orchestra announced on Thursday.
